ComicInfo.Summary:
Mark tries to deal with murdering Angstrom. A future Guardians of the Globe visit Mark and talk with him, then he is sent back to his home dimension. His Mom and Half-brother turn out ok. Meanwhile Robot breaks his end of the bargain with the Mauler Twins.
Features a Capes backup story.
